title.native: 悲劇の元凶となる最強外道ラスボス女王は民の為に尽くします。
title.romaji: Higeki no Genkyou to Naru Saikyou Gedou Last Boss Joou wa Tami no Tame ni Tsukushimasu.
title.english: The Most Heretical Last Boss Queen: From Villainess to Savior

description:
It’s one thing to get reincarnated as a righteous hero. It’s another thing entirely to get reincarnated as a villain! Our protagonist was just reincarnated into the body of Princess Pride Royal Ivy, the last boss and ultimate villain of her favorite otome game. But evil just isn’t her style, so she’ll use Pride’s powerful abilities to sow peace and love instead of discord! Can she change the fate of this vile villainess, or is her role in the story already rotten to the core?

(Source: HIDIVE)
synonyms: โศกนาฏกรรมของตัวร้ายสุดแกร่งอย่างราชินีลาสบอสจะขอถวายตัวเพื่อปวงชน
Ratu sang Bos Terakhir Paling Gila yang Akan Menjadi Sumber Tragedi Ingin Berjuang Demi Seluruh Rakyatnya

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Villainess
tags.description: Centers around or prominently features a villainous noble lady.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Male Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several male characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Orphan
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is an orphan.

node.description:
[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.

**Alma Mater:** Liverpool Institute for Performing Arts (BA Music)

[Website](https://tatsumusic.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/tatsu_saiki) | [SoundCloud](https://soundcloud.com/tatsuyan)

**Education:** Kunitachi College of Music

[Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/hanae-nakamura)

Hanae Nakamura is a music composer.

[Website](https://www.tsukuyomi2943.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Tsukuyomi_JP) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/YurryCanon/)

Tsukuyomi is a Japanese rock band formed in 2020 by VOCALOID producer, Yurry Canon. 

__Members:__
- [Yurry Canon](https://anilist.co/staff/273626) – Lyricist, Composer, Pianist
- [Epoch](https://anilist.co/staff/273628) – Guitarist
- [Toukasa](https://anilist.co/staff/273629) – Bassist
- [Yue](https://anilist.co/staff/274044) - Vocalist

__Former Member:__
- [Mikoto](https://anilist.co/staff/273627) – Vocalist

[Profile](http://lovesmile-music.jp/archives/creator/hirosawayuya) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/planetscape0516)

Yuuya Hirosawa is a Japanese composer and arranger.

[Website](https://choqmay-official.com/) | [YouTube](https://youtube.com/@Cho_Q_May) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Cho_Q_May) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/choqmay) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/5ZFxExn8YICZm9JFo9dqTq?si=2OqqlXTiRz-CAmdtBLoNpg)

**ChoQMay** is a Japanese pop band formed in 2020.

Members:
- Rei (麗) – Vocals, Guitar, Violin
- Renpi (れんぴ) – Piano
- Fujii Gon (藤井ごん) – Bass
- Kuga Kouichirou (空閑興一郎) – Drums
